bike.description: C5 high-modulus carbon w/ internal shift cable routing, shaped oversized ride-tuned down tube, tapered 1 1/8" - 1.5" head tube. Rear triangle: C5 super-light high-modulus carbon seatstays w/ shaped ride-tuned chainstay, cold-forged dropout and replaceable hanger
